"Sunnyside," Cooranbong, N.S.W., Australia, March 1, 1899. 

     The Southern Field; Principles That Should Actuate God's Workers. There is a heavy burden resting upon my mind much of the time. We are not doing all that we should do for the Southern field. The work must be established in this 


                                  -181- 

neglected field. What shall be done? If missionary effort is not put forth in this field, God will hold His people in America accountable.
